TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Samuluh, title = Samuluh, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samuluh} }

S.FORM: Samuluh Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Samuluh a niyaro', 56 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 255 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 243 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun86%, Amis2%, Paiwan2%, Puyuma2%, roma3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Samoloh Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Samoloh a niyaro', 56 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 255 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 95% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 243 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 5% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon86%, Amis2%, Paiwan2%, Poyoma2%, roma3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
